IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: Provide transitional housing and supportive services to homeless women who are substance abusers and HIV-AIDS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Organization has members with the power to elect and appoint of the governing body. The organization does not have stockholders.
